alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Saginaw; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Saginaw, Shiawassee and Genesee Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 314 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Charles to near Elsie to Edgemont Park. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... St. Charles around 320 AM EDT. Owosso around 325 AM EDT. Corunna and Henderson around 330 AM EDT. Oakley and Bridgeport around 335 AM EDT. Saginaw, Chesaning and Laingsburg around 340 AM EDT. Perry, New Lothrop and Morrice around 345 AM EDT. Montrose around 355 AM EDT. Bancroft around 400 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Brant, Atlas, Nelson, Garfield, Rankin, Fenmore, Burt, Gera, Layton Corners and Argentine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
